description: Sistema de Gestão de Ativos Digitais com Classificação Automatizada de Imagens Didáticas

userStories.title: Setup & EXIF Extraction POC
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to extract EXIF dates from images to establish chronological order.
acceptanceCriteria: Create project structure and virtual environment
Implement script to read EXIF 'DateTimeOriginal' from JPG/PNG
Fallback to 'DateTime' or file modification time if EXIF missing
Unit test for date extraction methodology

userStories.title: Basic File Organization Logic
userStories.description: As a user, I want my photos moved into a Year/Month/Day folder structure.
acceptanceCriteria: Implement file mover logic using shutil
Handle file naming collisions (e.g., append counter)
Process a test batch of images successfully

userStories.title: Deduplication System (MD5)
userStories.description: As a user, I want to prevent duplicate photos from cluttering my storage.
acceptanceCriteria: Implement MD5 hashing for file content
Move identified duplicates to a 'Quarantine' folder

userStories.title: Watchdog Monitoring Service
userStories.description: As a user, I want new photos to be organized automatically when added to the folder.

userStories.title: Static Web Gallery Generation
userStories.description: As a user, I want a web gallery to view my organized photos.
acceptanceCriteria: Generate HTML/static gallery from organized folders
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Antigravity Skill Encapsulation
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to reuse this logic as an Antigravity Skill.
